title: Damned Souls
description: "Traitor."That was my last thought before darkness took over. Now, I've just woken up in the hospital and realized that one of the men I love put me here. Rush is a member of the Trilogy, and there's nothing I can do to bring him back. Meanwhile, Dante has risen from the dead to take over the city and he has my father on his side.A new war is coming and Nico, Beck, Sophie and I are ready to throw everything we have at defeating them before they destroy the city.It's the eleventh hour and we're losing, but I've never been one to go down without a fight.  Damned Souls is an enemies to lovers contemporary mafia romance where the female main character will end up with multiple love interests by the end of the book. This is book three of three and has an HEA.
author: Kate   King
